Token.Abstract: Methods that generated an attributed string with Small Caps, even if the used fonts don't support them natively.

Creates an NSAttributedString from the given text and attributes and synthesizes small caps. On iPad there is only one font that has native small caps, for all other fonts the small caps are synthesized by reduzing the font size for all lowercase characters.

Parameter.Name: text
Parameter.Abstract: The string to convert into an attributed string

Parameter.Name: attributes
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary with attributes for the attributed string

ReturnValue.Abstract: An attributed string with synthesized small caps.
